message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm definitely interested in the product, but I was hoping to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to come down to $6,500?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to spend a bit less, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $7,000.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice. How about we split the difference again and settle at $6,750?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $6,900.
